name: Moisturizing Eye Bomb with Peptide and Ceramide
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is:u00a0A lightweight cream that floods the eye area with explosive moisture for up to 48 hours, visibly firming and reducing fine lines and wrinkles...Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptide: Visibly improves elasticity..- Ceramide: Improves the skin barrier..- Squalane: Stabilizes the skin barrier and maintains hydration...What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight Korean eye cream provides long-lasting moisturization and visibly firms the skin around the eye area. Itu2019s also formulated with peptides, ceramides, and squalane to visibly firm and reduce fine lines and wrinkles around the eye area. This eye cream was dermatologically tested...Clinical Results: In a clinical test, results showed:.- Provides visible firmness in 3 targeted areas: eye bags, crowu2019s feet, and eyelids..In a consumer study, after 2 weeks of use:.- 96% agree the skin around the eyes looks smoother.- 93% agree it feels like the eye skin area firmness has improved
ingredients: -Peptide: Visibly improves skinu2019s elasticity..-Ceramide: Supports skinu2019s moisture barrier..-Squalane: Stabilizes skinu2019s moisture barrier and maintains hydration...Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Squalane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Caprylyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sucrose Polystearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Panthenol, PCA Dimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-100 Stearate, C14-22 Alcohols, Silica, Ceramide NP, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cedrol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, PEG-10 Rapeseed Sterol, Carbomer, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Tromethamine, Polysorbate 60, Glycereth-20, Cellulose, Trisodium EDTA, Sorbitan Isostearate, Bakuchiol, Caffeine, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Nepeta Cataria Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract, Viola Tricolor Extract, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Menyanthes Trifoliata Leaf Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Before applying moisturizer, take a small amount and gently massage around eye area using your ring fingers..-Pat along eye contours until product is well absorbed...Precautions:.-Discontinue use if irritation or a rash occurs..-Consult a physician if irritation persists..-Do not use on broken or damaged skin..-Keep out of reach of children..-Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight..-For external use only.

reviews.review_title: Shame on Sephora,Belief & our joke Bureaucracy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It should be a federal law mandating all sellers including Sephora to state clearly on the front image or in large text whether or not a product has added formula changes. You shouldnu2019t have to take on the role of an FBI agent to discover whether or not a product you have used perfectly fine in the past has now recently caused atopic dermatitis around your eyelids. I do not understand why there is no transparency regarding these dangerous changes that potentially harm the consumer. Fine print, subtle packaging changes and whispers of reformulation are NOT acceptable modes of communicating to the consumer the ingredients have been changed especially when the ingredients added are known irritants. ALL reformulation should be highlighted in big dark bolded font as you do so with the ornamented images, price, beneficial ingredients, and positive marketing of the product. Companies will always maximize profits at the cost of the consumer but to maximize it at the cost of our health? Something should be done, shame on Sephora and shame on belief.

reviews.review_text: Sunday morning after a weekend of late nights was the perfect time for me to take the new Belif Aqua Bomb Eye Gel to task. Waking up to eyes that were still half shut in appearance, the cool ceramic applicator was so calming and I greatly appreciated the fact that I didnu2019t have to dip my fingers into a pot to apply. This soothing tip is a much more hygienic way of applying anything near the eyes and it allows for just the right amount of product with minimal waste. The caffeine immediately decreased the appearance of puffiness and bags around my lids. I loved the lightweight feel of the hyaluronic acid to moisturize. It absorbed so quickly and I am excited to use this longer term to see the benefits of Vitamin C and Niacinamide for my dark spots and crows feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Belif Moisturizing Eye Bomb Cream is a rejuvenating treat for the delicate skin around the eyes. This eye cream is designed to provide intense hydration, reduce puffiness, and soften the appearance of fine lines, making it an ideal addition to your skincare routine.  The lightweight formula is one of the standout features of this product. It feels airy and absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy or sticky residue, which is a significant advantage for an eye cream. After applying it, the skin around the eyes feels refreshed and instantly moisturized, creating a smooth canvas for makeup or just a natural look.  Belif Moisturizing Eye Bomb Cream is infused with a blend of nourishing ingredients, including comfrey leaf and pennywort extract, which are known for their hydrating and soothing properties. This combination helps to reduce puffiness and restore a bright, awake appearance to tired eyes.  Another notable aspect is the longevity of hydration. The Eye Bomb Cream provides moisture that lasts throughout the day, keeping the eye area feeling comfortable and soft. This long-lasting effect is especially helpful for those who suffer from dryness or irritation around the eyes.  The scent is very subtle, almost undetectable, which is ideal for a product designed for sensitive skin areas. The packaging is practical, with a twist-off cap that keeps the cream fresh and easy to access. However, as with most jar-based eye creams, it's a good practice to use a clean spatula or your finger to maintain hygiene.  Overall, Belif Moisturizing Eye Bomb Cream is a high-quality eye cream that delivers on its promises of hydration, puffiness reduction, and smoothing fine lines. Its lightweight texture, soothing ingredients, and long-lasting hydration make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their eye care routine. If you're seeking a product that refreshes and rejuvenates the eye area without feeling heavy, this Eye Bomb Cream is worth considering.

With its lightweight, gel-like texture, it effortlessly glides onto the delicate skin around the eyes, delivering a surge of moisture without any greasiness. This cream is a true multitasker, targeting various concerns such as dryness, fine lines, and puffiness with its potent blend of botanical extracts. One of its standout ingredients is comfrey leaf, renowned for its soothing properties, which helps to calm and revitalize tired eyes. Additionally, it contains oat kernel extract, which provides an instant tightening effect, leaving the eye area looking lifted and refreshed. What sets Belifu2019s Eye Cream apart is its commitment to clean ingredients. Free from parabens, sulfates, and phthalates, it offers peace of mind to those seeking a gentle yet effective solution for their skincare needs. After consistent use, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall appearance of my under-eye area. Dark circles appeared diminished, and my skin felt noticeably smoother and more supple. While the price point may be higher than some other options on the market, the results speak for themselves. Belifu2019s Eye Cream is a luxurious investment in your skincare routine that delivers on its promises.

reviews.review_text: The belief Moisturizing Eye Bomb has earned its status as a cult-favorite eye cream, delivering on its promises of hydration, fine line reduction, and revitalization for the delicate eye area. After extensive use, here's why it earns a glowing review: Firstly, its Hydration Powerhouse status is well-deserved, instantly rejuvenating the under-eye region with a remarkable dose of moisture, leaving the skin soft and supple. Its lightweight, gel-like texture absorbs swiftly, ensuring comfort throughout the day and under makeup. Furthermore, it impressively reduces puffiness and under-eye bags, combating tiredness effectively. While not a heavy-duty wrinkle treatment, it minimizes fine lines, imparting a smoother, more youthful appearance. Notably, its gentle, non-irritating formula caters to sensitive skin, being dermatologically tested and free from harmful additives. The inclusion of potent ingredients like comfrey leaf extract and pennywort herb strengthens the skin's moisture barrier, enhancing resilience over time. Lastly, its airless pump packaging preserves product freshness and hygiene while allowing precise dispensing, minimizing waste. Overall, the belief Moisturizing Eye Bomb stands out for its efficacy, comfort, and thoughtful design, making it a must-have in any skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: I have tried many eye creams in the past, and recently decided to give a new eye cream a try. Belief Moisturizing Eye Bomb, and I have been using it for the past few days.  Overall, I am quite impressed with this eye cream. It has a smooth and creamy texture that feels luxurious when applying it to the delicate skin around the eyes. It absorbs quickly and does not leave any greasy residue or make my skin feel heavy.  I have noticed that this eye cream has helped to reduce the appearance of fine lines and puffiness under my eyes. It also makes my eye area feel hydrated and refreshed. I have used it both in the morning and at night, and it provides a nice base for my makeup during the day.  One thing that I appreciate about this eye cream is that it does not irritate my sensitive skin. This one has been gentle and soothing.  The packaging of the eye cream is also convenient. I find that a little goes a long way, so it should last me a decent amount of time.  The only downside I would mention about this eye cream is the price. It is on the higher end compared to some other options on the market. However, considering the quality of the product and the noticeable results I have seen, I believe it is worth the investment.  Overall, I would highly recommend this eye cream to anyone looking for a hydrating and effective solution for fine lines and general eye rejuvenation. It has become a staple in my skincare routine, and I will continue to repurchase it in the future.

reviews.review_text: This eye cream is luxurious and feels amazing on your eyes. I absolutely love how it made my under eyes feel and even look brighter after just a few uses. I am definitely a fan and will plan to purchase more in the future.
